t: Amazon.com : Formula Ballistol Oil - 50ML - SB-B028-00 : Sports & Outdoors
s: Have used it a half-dozen times so far for cleaning firearms and a sewing machine. Good stuff! Expensive, but seems worth it. It's the grandfather of CLP. Amazon offers an interesting book: "Ballistol for Skin and Wound Care: Skin Wound Oil Dr. Schmid (Kindle Edition) by Peter Schmid.

t: Amazon.com : Ballistol Multi-Purpose Wipes ORMD : Sports & Outdoors
s: I bought the wipes after watching a YouTube video showing using Ballistol to revive outside door knobs that had faded from the sun. I figured the wipes would be easier for that job. Anyway they worked great! They leave a protective film on the surface that lasts!
